<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="International">International</span></h3>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:322px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Brazil_and_Croatia_match_at_the_FIFA_World_Cup_2014-06-12_(19).jpg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/22/Brazil_and_Croatia_match_at_the_FIFA_World_Cup_2014-06-12_%2819%29.jpg/320px-Brazil_and_Croatia_match_at_the_FIFA_World_Cup_2014-06-12_%2819%29.jpg" decoding="async" width="320" height="215" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/22/Brazil_and_Croatia_match_at_the_FIFA_World_Cup_2014-06-12_%2819%29.jpg/480px-Brazil_and_Croatia_match_at_the_FIFA_World_Cup_2014-06-12_%2819%29.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/22/Brazil_and_Croatia_match_at_the_FIFA_World_Cup_2014-06-12_%2819%29.jpg/640px-Brazil_and_Croatia_match_at_the_FIFA_World_Cup_2014-06-12_%2819%29.jpg 2x" data-file-width="4880" data-file-height="3280" /></a>  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a href="/wiki/File:Brazil_and_Croatia_match_at_the_FIFA_World_Cup_2014-06-12_(19).jpg" class="internal" title="Enlarge"></a></div>Neymar against Croatia at 2014 FIFA World Cup. <li><a href="/wiki/UNFP_Player_of_the_Month" title="UNFP Player of the Month">UNFP Ligue 1 Player of the Month</a>: December 2017,<sup id="cite_ref-UNFPPOTM_378-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-UNFPPOTM-378">&#91;361&#93;</a></sup> January 2020<sup id="cite_ref-379" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-379">&#91;362&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/UEFA_Team_of_the_Year" title="UEFA Team of the Year">UEFA Team of the Year</a>: <a href="/wiki/UEFA_Team_of_the_Year#Team_of_the_Year_2015" title="UEFA Team of the Year">2015</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-380" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-380">&#91;363&#93;</a></sup> <a href="/wiki/UEFA_Team_of_the_Year#Team_of_the_Year_2020" title="UEFA Team of the Year">2020</a><sup id="cite_ref-381" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-381">&#91;364&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/FIFPro#FIFA_FIFPro_Men&#39;s_World11" title="FIFPro">FIFA FIFPro World11</a>: 2015,<sup id="cite_ref-382" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-382">&#91;365&#93;</a></sup> <a href="/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2017#FIFA_FIFPro_World11" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2017">2017</a><sup id="cite_ref-383" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-383">&#91;366&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li>FIFA FIFPro World11 2nd team: 2013, 2014, 2016, 2018<sup id="cite_ref-384" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-384">&#91;367&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-385" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-385">&#91;368&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-386" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-386">&#91;369&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-387" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-387">&#91;370&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li>FIFA FIFPro World11 nominee: 2019 (6th forward),<sup id="cite_ref-388" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-388">&#91;371&#93;</a></sup> 2020 (6th forward)<sup id="cite_ref-389" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-389">&#91;372&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/IFFHS_World%27s_Best_Playmaker" class="mw-redirect" title="IFFHS World&#39;s Best Playmaker">IFFHS World's Best Playmaker</a> Bronze award: 2017<sup id="cite_ref-390" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-390">&#91;373&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/International_Federation_of_Football_History_%26_Statistics#IFFHS_Men&#39;s_World_Team" title="International Federation of Football History &amp; Statistics">IFFHS Men's World Team</a>: 2017<sup id="cite_ref-391" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-391">&#91;374&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/IFFHS" class="mw-redirect" title="IFFHS">IFFHS World's Best Man Player of the Decade 2011–2020</a>: 4th place<sup id="cite_ref-392" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-392">&#91;375&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/European_Sports_Magazines#ESM_Team_of_the_Year" class="mw-redirect" title="European Sports Magazines">ESM Team of the Year</a>: <a href="/wiki/European_Sports_Magazines#2017–18" class="mw-redirect" title="European Sports Magazines">2017–18</a><sup id="cite_ref-AZ2018_393-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-AZ2018-393">&#91;376&#93;</a></sup></li>

<p><b>Performances</b>

<li><a href="/wiki/South_American_Youth_Championship" class="mw-redirect" title="South American Youth Championship">South American Youth Championship</a> top scorer: <a href="/wiki/South_American_Youth_Championship#Goalscorers" class="mw-redirect" title="South American Youth Championship">2011</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Campeonato_Paulista" title="Campeonato Paulista">Campeonato Paulista</a> top scorer: <a href="/wiki/2012_Campeonato_Paulista#Top_goalscorers" title="2012 Campeonato Paulista">2012</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Copa_Libertadores" title="Copa Libertadores">Copa Libertadores</a> top scorer: <a href="/wiki/2012_Copa_Libertadores#Top_goalscorers" title="2012 Copa Libertadores">2012</a> <sup>(tied with <a href="/wiki/Mat%C3%ADas_Alustiza" title="Matías Alustiza">Matías Alustiza</a>)</sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Copa_Libertadores" title="Copa Libertadores">Copa Libertadores</a> 2nd top assist provider: <a href="/wiki/2012_Copa_Libertadores#Top_goalscorers" title="2012 Copa Libertadores">2012</a><sup id="cite_ref-395" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-395">&#91;378&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Copa_del_Rey" title="Copa del Rey">Copa del Rey</a> top scorer: <a href="/wiki/2014%E2%80%9315_Copa_del_Rey" title="2014–15 Copa del Rey">2014–15</a><sup id="cite_ref-396" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-396">&#91;379&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/UEFA_Champions_League" title="UEFA Champions League">UEFA Champions League</a> top scorer: <a href="/wiki/2014%E2%80%9315_UEFA_Champions_League#Top_goalscorers" title="2014–15 UEFA Champions League">2014–15</a> <sup>(tied with <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Cristiano Ronaldo</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Lionel Messi</a>)</sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/FIFA_Club_World_Cup" title="FIFA Club World Cup">FIFA Club World Cup</a> top assist provider: <a href="/wiki/2015_FIFA_Club_World_Cup" title="2015 FIFA Club World Cup">2015</a><sup id="cite_ref-397" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-397">&#91;380&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/UEFA_Champions_League" title="UEFA Champions League">UEFA Champions League</a> top assist provider: <a href="/wiki/2015%E2%80%9316_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2015–16 UEFA Champions League">2015–16</a>, <a href="/wiki/2016%E2%80%9317_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2016–17 UEFA Champions League">2016–17</a><sup id="cite_ref-398" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-398">&#91;381&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Notes">Notes</span></h2>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1011085734"/><div class="reflist">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-11"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-11">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Although Barcelona did not classify Neymar's €222&#160;million buyout clause as a transfer fee, it was functionally identical to a transfer fee, since it cancelled his then-current contract with Barcelona (as in a typical transfer). The payment, provided by an unknown source, made him the most expensive football player.<sup id="cite_ref-FCB_Neymar_9-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-FCB_Neymar-9">&#91;9&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-BBC_Neymar_10-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-BBC_Neymar-10">&#91;10&#93;</a></sup></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<li id="cite_note-24"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-24">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2012/07/10/sports/soccer/neymar-soccer-prodigy-is-at-home-in-brazil.html?pagewanted=all&amp;_r=0">"Soccer Prodigy, at Home in Brazil"</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20170805062720/http://www.nytimes.com/2012/07/10/sports/soccer/neymar-soccer-prodigy-is-at-home-in-brazil.html?pagewanted=all&amp;_r=0">Archived</a> 5 August 2017 at the <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">Wayback Machine</a>. <i>The New York Times</i>. Retrieved 22 May 2014</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-25"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-25">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Neymar Sr.'s own words explaining the decision, as translated in the referred source: “We’re from a humble family, and in a humble family there is always the question of cultural values,” he said. 
“We thought he had to grow up in Brazil. That was the first serious choice we had to make.”</span>
</li>

<div class="boilerplate metadata plainlinks tfd" id="tfd" style="background-color: transparent; padding: 0; font-size: 85%; color:#000000; text-align: center; border-bottom:1px solid #AAAAAA;">‹&#160;The <a href="/wiki/Help:Template" title="Help:Template">template</a> below (<i><a href="/wiki/Template:FIFA_World_Cup_Bronze_Boot" title="Template:FIFA World Cup Bronze Boot">FIFA World Cup Bronze Boot</a></i>) is being considered for deletion&#32;to {{{otherpage}}}. See <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Templates_for_discussion/Log/2021_March_12#Template:FIFA_World_Cup_Bronze_Boot" title="Wikipedia:Templates for discussion/Log/2021 March 12">templates for discussion</a> to help reach a consensus.&#160;›</div>

<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/1982_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1982 FIFA World Cup">1982</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2e/Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2e/Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2e/Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Zico_(footballer)" title="Zico (footballer)">Zico</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/1990_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1990 FIFA World Cup">1990</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England_national_football_team" title="England national football team"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Gary_Lineker" title="Gary Lineker">Lineker</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Cameroon_national_football_team" title="Cameroon national football team"><img alt="Cameroon" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4f/Flag_of_Cameroon.svg/15px-Flag_of_Cameroon.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4f/Flag_of_Cameroon.svg/23px-Flag_of_Cameroon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4f/Flag_of_Cameroon.svg/30px-Flag_of_Cameroon.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Roger_Milla" title="Roger Milla">Milla</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/1994_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1994 FIFA World Cup">1994</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Sweden_national_football_team" title="Sweden national football team"><img alt="Sweden" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/15px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/23px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/30px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1600" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Kennet_Andersson" title="Kennet Andersson">Andersson</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Rom%C3%A1rio" title="Romário">Romário</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/1998_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1998 FIFA World Cup">1998</a></b> &amp; <b><a href="/wiki/2002_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2002 FIFA World Cup">2002</a>:</b> <i>Not awarded</i> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2006 FIFA World Cup">2006</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background:#CD7F32;;width:1%">Bronze Boot</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2010_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2010 FIFA World Cup">2010</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands_national_football_team" title="Netherlands national football team"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Wesley_Sneijder" title="Wesley Sneijder">Sneijder</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2014_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2014 FIFA World Cup">2014</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Neymar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="/wiki/2018_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2018 FIFA World Cup">2018</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Belgium_national_football_team" title="Belgium national football team"><img alt="Belgium" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/15px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/30px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Romelu_Lukaku" title="Romelu Lukaku">Lukaku</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="2" style="background:#CD7F32;"><div>
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">Bronze Shoe was first awarded in <a href="/wiki/1982_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1982 FIFA World Cup">1982</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">Bronze Boot was first awarded in <a href="/wiki/2010_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2010 FIFA World Cup">2010</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1992: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Argentina" title="Argentina"><img alt="Argentina" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/15px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/23px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/30px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Fernando_Redondo" title="Fernando Redondo">Redondo</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/15px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/30px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Robert_Pires" title="Robert Pires">Pires</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Kak%C3%A1" title="Kaká">Kaká</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Germany" title="Germany"><img alt="Germany" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/15px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/23px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/30px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Julian_Draxler" title="Julian Draxler">Draxler</a></span></li></ul>

<ul><li><span class="nowrap">2005: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Mexico" title="Mexico"><img alt="Mexico" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/15px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/23px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/30px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="980" data-file-height="560" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Oswaldo_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Oswaldo Sánchez">Sánchez</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/J%C3%BAlio_C%C3%A9sar_(football_goalkeeper,_born_1979)" title="Júlio César (football goalkeeper, born 1979)">Júlio César</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Chile" title="Chile"><img alt="Chile" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/15px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/23px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/30px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Claudio_Bravo" title="Claudio Bravo">Bravo</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background:#FFD700; color:#00008B;;width:1%;background:#FFD700; color:#00008B;">Top goalscorer</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1992: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Argentina" title="Argentina"><img alt="Argentina" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/15px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/23px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/30px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Gabriel_Batistuta" title="Gabriel Batistuta">Batistuta</a><sup>†</sup> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States"><img alt="United States" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1235" data-file-height="650" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Bruce_Murray_(soccer)" title="Bruce Murray (soccer)">Murray</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1995: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Mexico" title="Mexico"><img alt="Mexico" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/15px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/23px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/30px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="980" data-file-height="560" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Luis_Garc%C3%ADa_Postigo" title="Luis García Postigo">García</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Rom%C3%A1rio" title="Romário">Romário</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Saudi_Arabia" title="Saudi Arabia"><img alt="Saudi Arabia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0d/Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg/15px-Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0d/Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg/23px-Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0d/Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg/30px-Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Marzouk_Al-Otaibi" title="Marzouk Al-Otaibi">Al-Otaibi</a>, <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Mexico" title="Mexico"><img alt="Mexico" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/15px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/23px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/30px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="980" data-file-height="560" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Cuauht%C3%A9moc_Blanco" title="Cuauhtémoc Blanco">Blanco</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ronaldinho" title="Ronaldinho">Ronaldinho</a><sup>†</sup></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/15px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" <li><a href="/wiki/2007_South_American_U-20_Championship" title="2007 South American U-20 Championship">2007</a>: <a href="/wiki/Edinson_Cavani" title="Edinson Cavani">Cavani</a> (7 goals)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/2009_South_American_U-20_Championship" title="2009 South American U-20 Championship">2009</a>: <a href="/wiki/Walter_Henrique_da_Silva" class="mw-redirect" title="Walter Henrique da Silva">Walter</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Hern%C3%A1n_P%C3%A9rez_(footballer)" title="Hernán Pérez (footballer)">H. Pérez</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Robin_Ram%C3%ADrez" title="Robin Ramírez">R. Ramírez</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Abel_Hern%C3%A1ndez" title="Abel Hernández">A. Hernández</a> (5 goals)</li>

<li><a href="/wiki/2013_South_American_Youth_Football_Championship" title="2013 South American Youth Football Championship">2013</a>: <a href="/wiki/Nicol%C3%A1s_L%C3%B3pez_(footballer,_born_1993)" title="Nicolás López (footballer, born 1993)">N. López</a> (6 goals)</li>

<li><a href="/wiki/2017_South_American_Youth_Football_Championship" class="mw-redirect" title="2017 South American Youth Football Championship">2017</a>: <a href="/wiki/Rodrigo_Amaral" title="Rodrigo Amaral">Amaral</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Bryan_Cabezas" title="Bryan Cabezas">Cabezas</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Lautaro_Mart%C3%ADnez" title="Lautaro Martínez">Martínez</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Marcelo_Torres" title="Marcelo Torres">Torres</a> (5 goals)</li>

<li>CB: <a href="/wiki/Sergio_Ramos" title="Sergio Ramos">Ramos</a></li>

<li>MF: <a href="/wiki/James_Rodr%C3%ADguez" title="James Rodríguez">Rodríguez</a></li>

<li>FW: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Neymar</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li>FW: <a href="/wiki/Jonas_(footballer,_born_1984)" title="Jonas (footballer, born 1984)">Jonas</a></li></ul>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="South_American_Footballer_of_the_Year" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:South_American_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template:South American Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:South_American_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:South American Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:South_American_Footballer_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="South_American_Footballer_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/South_American_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="South American Footballer of the Year">South American Footballer of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%"><i>El Mundo</i> award</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1971: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Tost%C3%A3o" title="Tostão">Tostão</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1972: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Peru" title="Peru"><img alt="Peru" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cf/Flag_of_Peru.svg/15px-Flag_of_Peru.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cf/Flag_of_Peru.svg/23px-Flag_of_Peru.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cf/Flag_of_Peru.svg/30px-Flag_of_Peru.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Te%C3%B3filo_Cubillas" title="Teófilo Cubillas">Cubillas</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1973: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Pel%C3%A9" title="Pelé">Pelé</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1974: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Chile" title="Chile"><img alt="Chile" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/15px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/23px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/30px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/El%C3%ADas_Figueroa" title="Elías Figueroa">Figueroa</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1975: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Chile" title="Chile"><img alt="Chile" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/15px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/23px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/30px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/El%C3%ADas_Figueroa" title="Elías Figueroa">Figueroa</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1976: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Chile" title="Chile"><img alt="Chile" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/15px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/23px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/30px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/El%C3%ADas_Figueroa" title="Elías Figueroa">Figueroa</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1977: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Zico_(footballer)" title="Zico (footballer)">Zico</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1978: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Argentina" title="Argentina"><img alt="Argentina" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/15px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/23px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/30px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Mario_Kempes" title="Mario Kempes">Kempes</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1979: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Argentina" title="Argentina"><img alt="Argentina" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/15px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/23px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/30px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Diego_Maradona" title="Diego Maradona">Maradona</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1980: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Argentina" title="Argentina"><img alt="Argentina" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/15px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/23px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/30px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Diego_Maradona" title="Diego Maradona">Maradona</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1981: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Zico_(footballer)" title="Zico (footballer)">Zico</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1982: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Zico_(footballer)" title="Zico (footballer)">Zico</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1983: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/S%C3%B3crates" title="Sócrates">Sócrates</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1984: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Uruguay" title="Uruguay"><img alt="Uruguay" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/15px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/23px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/30px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="945" data-file-height="630" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Enzo_Francescoli" title="Enzo Francescoli">Francescoli</a> </span></li>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%"><i>El País</i> award</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2012_South_American_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="2012 South American Footballer of the Year">2012</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Neymar</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Ricardo_Goulart" title="Ricardo Goulart">Ricardo Goulart</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <a href="/wiki/Gabriel_Jesus" title="Gabriel Jesus">Gabriel Jesus</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="/wiki/J%C3%B4" title="Jô">Jô</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a href="/wiki/Dudu_(footballer,_born_1992)" title="Dudu (footballer, born 1992)">Dudu</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/Gabriel_Barbosa" title="Gabriel Barbosa">Gabriel Barbosa</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a href="/wiki/Claudinho_(footballer,_born_1997)" title="Claudinho (footballer, born 1997)">Claudinho</a></span></li></ul>
<hr />
<p><sup>1</sup> As <i>Hors concours</i>
<sup>2</sup> <i><a href="/wiki/Placar" title="Placar">Placar</a></i> started to give this prize to the best grade holder at <a href="/wiki/Bola_de_Prata_(Brazil)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bola de Prata (Brazil)">Bola de Prata</a> since 1973. In its 2013 ceremonies, a Bola de Ouro was given to Dirceu Lopes, holder of the best 1971 grade. <a href="/wiki/Francisco_Santiago_Reyes" title="Francisco Santiago Reyes">Francisco Reyes</a> and <a href="/wiki/El%C3%ADas_Figueroa" title="Elías Figueroa">Elías Figueroa</a>, holders of 1970 and 1972 ones respectively, have not been announced as these years' winners yet.
</p>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <a href="/wiki/Michael_Essien" title="Michael Essien">Essien</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <a href="/wiki/Juninho_Pernambucano" title="Juninho Pernambucano">Juninho</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <a href="/wiki/Florent_Malouda" title="Florent Malouda">Malouda</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <a href="/wiki/Karim_Benzema" title="Karim Benzema">Benzema</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a href="/wiki/Yoann_Gourcuff" title="Yoann Gourcuff">Gourcuff</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="/wiki/Lisandro_L%C3%B3pez" title="Lisandro López">Lisandro</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <a href="/wiki/Eden_Hazard" title="Eden Hazard">Hazard</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <a href="/wiki/Eden_Hazard" title="Eden Hazard">Hazard</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <a href="/wiki/Zlatan_Ibrahimovi%C4%87" title="Zlatan Ibrahimovi">Ibrahimovi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Zlatan_Ibrahimovi%C4%87" title="Zlatan Ibrahimovi">Ibrahimovi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <a href="/wiki/Alexandre_Lacazette" title="Alexandre Lacazette">Lacazette</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <a href="/wiki/Zlatan_Ibrahimovi%C4%87" title="Zlatan Ibrahimovi">Ibrahimovi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="/wiki/Edinson_Cavani" title="Edinson Cavani">Cavani</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Neymar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/Kylian_Mbapp%C3%A9" title="Kylian Mbappé">Mbappé</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020: award Not Given</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="European_Cup_and_UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" title="Template:UEFA Champions League top scorers"><abbr title="View this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" title="Template talk:UEFA Champions League top scorers"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="European_Cup_and_UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/List_of_UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers" title="List of UEFA Champions League top scorers">European Cup and UEFA Champions League top scorers</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">European Cup</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li>1962–63: <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Altafini" title="José Altafini">Altafini</a></li>
<li>1963–64: <a href="/wiki/Vladica_Kova%C4%8Devi%C4%87" title="Vladica Kovaevi">Kovaevi</a>, <a href="/wiki/Sandro_Mazzola" title="Sandro Mazzola">Mazzola</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Ferenc_Pusk%C3%A1s" title="Ferenc Puskás">Puskás</a></li>
<li>1964–65: <a href="/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Torres_(footballer,_born_1938)" title="José Torres (footballer, born 1938)">Torres</a></li>
<li>1965–66: <a href="/wiki/Fl%C3%B3ri%C3%A1n_Albert" title="Flórián Albert">Albert</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a></li>
<li>1966–67: <a href="/wiki/J%C3%BCrgen_Piepenburg" title="Jürgen Piepenburg">Piepenburg</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Paul_Van_Himst" title="Paul Van Himst">Van Himst</a></li>

<li>1968–69: <a href="/wiki/Denis_Law" title="Denis Law">Law</a></li>
<li>1969–70: <a href="/wiki/Mick_Jones_(footballer,_born_1945)" title="Mick Jones (footballer, born 1945)">Jones</a></li>
<li>1970–71: <a href="/wiki/Antonis_Antoniadis" title="Antonis Antoniadis">Antoniadis</a></li>

<li>1973–74: <a href="/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>

<li>1975–76: <a href="/wiki/Jupp_Heynckes" title="Jupp Heynckes">Heynckes</a></li>
<li>1976–77: <a href="/wiki/Franco_Cucinotta" title="Franco Cucinotta">Cucinotta</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>
<li>1977–78: <a href="/wiki/Allan_Simonsen" title="Allan Simonsen">Simonsen</a></li>
<li>1978–79: <a href="/wiki/Claudio_Sulser" title="Claudio Sulser">Sulser</a></li>
<li>1979–80: <a href="/wiki/S%C3%B8ren_Lerby" title="Søren Lerby">Lerby</a></li>
<li>1980–81: <a href="/wiki/Terry_McDermott" title="Terry McDermott">McDermott</a>, <a href="/wiki/Karl-Heinz_Rummenigge" title="Karl-Heinz Rummenigge">Rummenigge</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Graeme_Souness" title="Graeme Souness">Souness</a></li>

<li>1983–84: <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Sokol_(footballer,_born_1954)" title="Viktor Sokol (footballer, born 1954)">Sokol</a></li>
<li>1984–85: <a href="/wiki/Torbj%C3%B6rn_Nilsson" title="Torbjörn Nilsson">Nilsson</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Michel_Platini" title="Michel Platini">Platini</a></li>
<li>1985–86: <a href="/wiki/Torbj%C3%B6rn_Nilsson" title="Torbjörn Nilsson">Nilsson</a></li>
<li>1986–87: <a href="/wiki/Borislav_Cvetkovi%C4%87" title="Borislav Cvetkovi">Cvetkovi</a></li>
<li>1987–88: <a href="/wiki/Rui_%C3%81guas_(footballer)" title="Rui Águas (footballer)">R. Águas</a>, <a href="/wiki/Jean-Marc_Ferreri" title="Jean-Marc Ferreri">Ferreri</a>, <a href="/wiki/Gheorghe_Hagi" title="Gheorghe Hagi">Hagi</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rabah_Madjer" title="Rabah Madjer">Madjer</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ally_McCoist" title="Ally McCoist">McCoist</a>, <a href="/wiki/M%C3%ADchel_(footballer,_born_1963)" title="Míchel (footballer, born 1963)">Míchel</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Petar_Nov%C3%A1k" title="Petar Novák">Novák</a></li>

<li>1991–92: <a href="/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Papin" title="Jean-Pierre Papin">Papin</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Sergei_Yuran" title="Sergei Yuran">Yuran</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">UEFA Champions League</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li>1993: <a href="/wiki/Juan_Carlos_Almada" title="Juan Carlos Almada">Almada</a></li>

<li>1998: <a href="/w/index.php?title=S%C3%A9rgio_Jo%C3%A3o&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Sérgio João (page does not exist)">Sérgio João</a></li>
<li>1999: <a href="/wiki/V%C3%ADctor_Bonilla" title="Víctor Bonilla">Bonilla</a>, <a href="/wiki/Fernando_Baiano" title="Fernando Baiano">Fernando Baiano</a>, <a href="/wiki/Gauchinho" title="Gauchinho">Gauchinho</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ruberth_Mor%C3%A1n" title="Ruberth Morán">Morán</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Rub%C3%A9n_Sosa" title="Rubén Sosa">Sosa</a></li>
<li>2000: <a href="/wiki/Luiz%C3%A3o_(footballer,_born_1975)" title="Luizão (footballer, born 1975)">Luizão</a></li>
<li>2001: <a href="/wiki/Lopes_Tigr%C3%A3o" title="Lopes Tigrão">Lopes</a></li>
<li>2002: <a href="/wiki/Rodrigo_Mendes" title="Rodrigo Mendes">Rodrigo Mendes</a></li>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Campeonato_Paulista_top_scorers" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Campeonato_Paulista_top_scorers" title="Template:Campeonato Paulista top scorers"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Campeonato_Paulista_top_scorers" title="Template talk:Campeonato Paulista top scorers"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Campeonato_Paulista_top_scorers&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Campeonato_Paulista_top_scorers" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Campeonato_Paulista" title="Campeonato Paulista">Campeonato Paulista</a> top scorers</div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1902: <a href="/wiki/Charles_William_Miller" title="Charles William Miller">Miller</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1903: Álvaro &amp; Boyes</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1904: Boyes &amp; <a href="/wiki/Charles_William_Miller" title="Charles William Miller">Miller</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1905: <a href="/wiki/Hermann_Friese" title="Hermann Friese">Friese</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1906: Fuller</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1907: Léo</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1908: Peres</span></li>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="FIFA_Puskás_Award" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:FIFA_Pusk%C3%A1s_Award" title="Template:FIFA Puskás Award"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:FIFA_Pusk%C3%A1s_Award" title="Template talk:FIFA Puskás Award"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:FIFA_Pusk%C3%A1s_Award&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="FIFA_Puskás_Award" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/FIFA_Pusk%C3%A1s_Award" title="FIFA Puskás Award">FIFA Puskás Award</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2009_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year#FIFA_Puskás_Award" title="2009 FIFA World Player of the Year">2009</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/15px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/23px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/30px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2010_FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or#FIFA_Puskás_Award" title="2010 FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">2010</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Turkey_national_football_team" title="Turkey national football team"><img alt="Turkey" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Flag_of_Turkey.svg/15px-Flag_of_Turkey.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Flag_of_Turkey.svg/23px-Flag_of_Turkey.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b4/Flag_of_Turkey.svg/30px-Flag_of_Turkey.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="800" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Hamit_Alt%C4%B1ntop" title="Hamit Altntop">Altntop</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2011_FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or#FIFA_Puskás_Award" title="2011 FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">2011</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Neymar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2012_FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or#FIFA_Puskás_Award" title="2012 FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">2012</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Slovakia_national_football_team" title="Slovakia national football team"><img alt="Slovakia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e6/Flag_of_Slovakia.svg/15px-Flag_of_Slovakia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e6/Flag_of_Slovakia.svg/23px-Flag_of_Slovakia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e6/Flag_of_Slovakia.svg/30px-Flag_of_Slovakia.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="341" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Miroslav_Stoch" title="Miroslav Stoch">Stoch</a></span></li>

	</h3>
	<div class="vector-menu-content">
		<ul class="vector-menu-content-list"><li id="n-mainpage-description"><a href="/wiki/Main_Page" title="Visit the main page [z]" accesskey="z">Main page</a></li><li id="n-contents"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents" title="Guides to browsing Wikipedia">Contents</a></li><li id="n-currentevents"><a href="/wiki/Portal:Current_events" title="Articles related to current events">Current events</a></li><li id="n-randompage"><a href="/wiki/Special:Random" title="Visit a randomly selected article [x]" accesskey="x">Random article</a></li><li id="n-aboutsite"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:About" title="Learn about Wikipedia and how it works">About Wikipedia</a></li><li id="n-contactpage"><a href="//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contact_us" title="How to contact Wikipedia">Contact us</a></li><li id="n-sitesupport"><a href="https://donate.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FundraiserRedirector?utm_source=donate&amp;utm_medium=sidebar&amp;utm_campaign=C13_en.wikipedia.org&amp;uselang=en" title="Support us by donating to the Wikimedia Foundation">Donate</a></li></ul>
